name: Sanguine Modules
author: Bloodbat
description: A collection of modules based on Mutable Instruments Eurorack devices and their variants.

modules.name: Sanguine Mutants Blank
modules.description: Put a goblin and the Mutants logo on your rack!

modules.name: Nodi
modules.description: A macro oscillator based on Mutable Instruments' Braids

modules.name: Contextus
modules.description: A macro oscillator based on the Renaissance alternative firmware for Braids

modules.name: Nebulae
modules.description: A texture synthesizer based on Audible Instruments' Clouds

modules.name: Etesia
modules.description: A texture synthesizer based on the Clouds Parasite

modules.name: Mortuus
modules.description: Based on the Dead Man's Catch alternative firmware for Peaks

modules.name: Fluctus
modules.description: A texture synthesizer based on the Kammerl Beat-Repeat firmware

modules.name: Incurvationes
modules.description: A meta modulator based on Mutable Instruments Warps

modules.name: Distortiones
modules.description: A doctored meta modulator based on the Parasite alternative firmware for Warps

modules.name: Mutuus
modules.description: An experimental meta modulator based on the Symbiote alternative firmware for Warps

modules.name: Explorator
modules.description: A fully polyphonic multiple, mixer, noise source, sample and hold, inverter, rectifier and logic unit, based on Mutable Instruments Links and Kinks

modules.name: Anuli
modules.description: Anuli is a polyphonic resonator based on Mutable Instruments Rings

modules.name: Velamina
modules.description: A voltage controller amplifier based on the revised Mutable Instruments Veils
